page.title: 05EDUCATION(1).CALCOT,READING
page.content: The Calcot area is well served for primary and secondary schools.There is,however,increasing pressure for more nursery schools,which number few at present.Playgroups for the under 5's go some way towards meeting the local need for pre-school provision. Over the past few years large numbers of children have been passing through the primary school system. Secondary schools are just about to receive this 'bulge'. At this moment in time the pressure to enlarge the area of intake of the two Reading Grammar schools is causing great concern.Parents in this area send their children mainly to the two local comprehensive schools, which stand to lose the most able children if the plan goes ahead.
